name: MyBusTimes
tagline: Fictional bus operations for simulation fans.
summary: A fictional bus simulation platform where users create and manage simulated operators.
description: MyBusTimes is a community-driven simulation where transport enthusiasts can build virtual operators, share liveries, and explore fleet ideas in a fictional world.

name: VTM-T200
tagline: Realistic ETM simulation for virtual fleets.
summary: An Electronic Ticket Machine simulator for virtual bus fleets, with route and fare selection, trip reporting, and real-time status monitoring.
description: VTM-T200 lets virtual operators practice ticketing workflows with route selection, fares, announcements, and reporting, all in a simulation-only environment where no money is ever spent.

name: VTM-TP5800
summary: A virtual ticket machine simulator focused on classic hardware flows for transport hobbyists.
description: VTM-TP5800 recreates traditional ticketing experiences for virtual fleets, built for enthusiasts who want to explore professional transit operations in a safe, fictional setting.

name: MyBusTimes Tracking Engine
summary: A tracking engine that powers simulated vehicle movement inside the MyBusTimes ecosystem.
description: The tracking engine provides simulation-ready location updates and status changes for virtual fleets in the MyBusTimes platform.
